dmca.title: ArticleInsider Claims 3 Infringements Inside Google Search
dmca.body:
Content Infringement Notice
Attn: DMCA complaints
On behalf of
Articlelnsider.com
5/6/2005
Contact Info:
Infosearch Media, Inc. [private]
Marina Del Rey, CA 90292
Phone: [private] Fax: [private]
Ann: [private] at [private]@infosearchmedia.com

Incident#1
The copyrighted work at issue is the article "A Brief History of E Mini Futures Trading" by Staff Writer posted on the Article Insider web site at http://futures.articleinsider.com/51399_e_mini_futures_trading.html
Search Query: "Back in September 1997, the Chicago Mercantile Exchange launched the first E Mini, which was tied to the SP 500."
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.freelance-employment.info/trading/E-mini-Futures-Trading.shtml
My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 Phone: [private]
Email of infringing website: [private]@freelance-emplovment.info
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Signature
Fax to: [private]

Incident#2

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.freelance‑
emplovment.info/computer/Antipiracy-Laws.shtml,

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Signature

Incident#3
The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Learning about Cattle Commodity Trading" by Staff Writer posted on the Article Insider web site at http://futures.articleinsider.com/51391_cattle_commodity_trading.html
Search Query: "Old-time cattle buyers would roll over in their graves at how cattle are being traded today." Infringing Web Pages: http://forex4money.com/finance/futures/
